page.title: 18CHANGING TIMES (a)
page.content: Of the older senior citizens questioned on the changes the main change from the second world war to the coronation of Queen Elizabeth II was thought to be the increase in the cost of living.The main changes from the coronation to the present day are the large numbers of houses that have been built, also more older people than there were thirty years ago,they said that people seemed to be living quite a bit longer than they used to do. Into their eighties, nineties and even hundreds. They said it was partly because of better food and medical attention. The modern day of living had changed over the years and that televison had a big influence on people's lives and not for the better. Older people thought that shopping facilities had worsened, violence and drug addiction now more common.
